url.title: C9 Lectures: Mahmoud Saleh - Advanced CRT
url.description: You first met Mahmoud Saleh in an episode of C9::GoingNative covering CRT (C Run-time Library). Mahmoud is the keeper of the CRT(C Run-time Library) at Microsoft, working on the VC++ team as a&#8230;
